introduce.description: Scenarios help you orchestrate more complex requirements or user stories. Compared to single-step test cases, scenarios can contain more steps and processes.
introduce.capabilities: Here you and your team can complete the following work:
introduce.capability3: Quickly generate scenario test scripts and tasks.

introduce.description: Scenario monitoring helps us understand system or business status from an interface perspective, identify and resolve potential issues in a timely manner, thereby improving system reliability and user satisfaction, and providing strong support for stable business operations. Main application scenarios are as follows:

apiDelay.title: API Delay Monitoring
apiDelay.description: Track API response times to ensure access experience. For example: Monitor the average response time of payment APIs to ensure it doesn't exceed 500ms.

healthCheck.title: Check System Health Status
healthCheck.description: Determine if the system is running normally in a quick and simple way. For example: Verify the running status of components in system or service health check endpoints (/health).

apiFunctionality.title: API Functionality Correctness Check
apiFunctionality.description: Regularly test the functional correctness of APIs to ensure expected behavior. For example: Automatically test user registration APIs to verify account creation processes.

businessProcess.title: Critical Business Process Monitoring
businessProcess.description: Monitor the integrity and correctness of core business processes. For example: Whether payment orders and payment amounts are consistent in business up to the current time.
